An ambidextrous engineer with a bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering, master’s degree in electrical and computer engineering. Small startup with many small businesses where I contributed towards multidiciplinary fields. I grew to be omnidexterous undertaking numerous tasks. I have assisted in developing a server robot using ROS, and led the design of the press-sushi automation machine. I have used Revit and Chief Architect to provide material costing and 3D visualizations to the clients. I have even done frontend development for a CRM software from prototyping to a product here.

Dec 2021 - Jun 2023

Quality Engineer Intern

John Deere

In this manufacturing facility, I assessed quality issues in pump, motor, transmission and axle production line and followed-up with corrective actions. This often required contacting the international suppliers and the warranty coordinators, preparing feedback and process improvement presentations, and more. The internship provided me opportunities to understand the fast-paced environment of heavy machine manufacturing industry.

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
